page.title: 15HOUSING. PRICE RANGE
page.content:
There are some very expensive properties in this area. Estimates of their values varied from Â£50,000 to Â£500,000. Many houses have interesting histories, and will be dealt with on subsequent pages, and most of them now have electricity supplies but not mains gas.
There is an estate of {Council Houses} in Knowl Hill. These were built in 1951/2 . {Prefabs},also in Knowl Hill, built in 1948 are still in use as temporary housing for the homeless. Mains Drainage was brought to the area in 1984. The local council have drawn up plans to re-develop the prefab site with work due to begin in{August 1986. } 30 new units are to be built, some 3 bedroomed, some one bedroomed homes.
